p: For sequencing platform, the majority of the studies (70.9%, N = 85) performed NGS with Illumina sequencing platform, followed by 454 pyrosequencing (19.2%, N = 23), and Ion Torrent sequencing (5.8%, N = 7). ( Figure 2 and Figure 3B). Only one study sequenced with the Nanopore platform (0.8%). Four studies (3.3%) did not specify which sequencing platforms were used [ 40, 41, 42, 43]. The earliest included study was published in 2009. 454 pyrosequencing was the most popular platform during 2009â€“2013, gradually replaced by Illumina starting from 2014 ( Supplementary Materials Figure S1).
